# hash join
"select /*vt+ HASH_JOINS */ music.col from user join music"

  "Original": "select /*vt+ HASH_JOINS */ music.col from user join music",
  "Instructions": {
    "Opcode": "NestedLoopJoin",
    "Left": {
      "Opcode": "SelectScatter",
      "Keyspace": {
        "Name": "user",
        "Sharded": true
      },
      "Query": "select 1 from user",
      "FieldQuery": "select 1 from user where 1 != 1",
      "Table": "user"
    },
    "Right": {
      "Opcode": "SelectScatter",
      "Keyspace": {
        "Name": "user",
        "Sharded": true
      },
      "Query": "select music.col from music",
      "FieldQuery": "select music.col from music where 1 != 1",
